name: Amateur Porn Style LoRA [1MB]
description:
A Style-LoRA for re-creating that low definition, natural, sometimes blurry look you know from amateur porn that is often created with bad lighting conditions. This will also affect the look of your subject ;)

If you feel like supporting my work, please consider visiting my Patreon to get access to more detailed instructions on how to get the most out of my models and have a say in what's up next: Link.

What it does:

It will change your image to have bad lighting, desaturated colors, and often hard shadows due to the use of the camera flash. It will also change the look of rooms to what you'd find in many average households, sometimes along with some mess in the background.

People will also look more 'average', so this will probably mess with your dream waifu.

Although it was made for usage with pornographic imagery, it can make pretty much any scene look like an amateur photograph.

You can use it at any strength you want, it will just change the intensity of the effect. I'd recommend 0.8 as a starting point

HD Porn version here: HD Porn Style LoRA

Based on UberRealisticPornMerge

If you like this, you may also like my other LoRAs.
